Perceptor:

Perceptor was watching the battle in computer's screen and decided 
to prepare a trick if it was needed. And sent a encoded comlink to 
Hydras "Master I'm ready to help in case that you need with 
operation "Blackmail", you just have to said"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@a... wrote:
> OOC:sheesh you call that a little?
>  Hydras let out a roar of pain as the kick sent him flying 
backwards, The fire 
> closed around the rocks moved closing his wounds. Perceptor's 
message bellowed 
> and he saw the anger in Rodimus's eyes.."Yes Prime do it use your 
anger I love 
> it!" As Rodimus lept off at incredible speed He shot fire from his 
mouth,the 
> two tails lashing out toslice open the bot, his eyes shot out the 
lasers and 
> his shoulder blasters rang out 15 shots all right onto the coming 
Rodimus.

damage to Hydras,

> > Rodimus brought his arms down in a "x" formation, forcing the 
swords, and 
> > Hydras' arms down. Rodimus then grabbed Hydras around the wrist 
with his left

down into Hydras'

up to double 
> > dropkick Hydras. After hitting this he back flips away and to 
his feet.

> > Rodimus stands motionless, and optics look empty, like all hope

> > Rodimus Prime: Enough of this! Maximals, kill these bastards in 
cold fluid!
> > Rodimus' face shows nothing but hate. He grits his teeth 
together, while letting

fomeing at the

causes his > normally blue optic sensors to turn a crimson red. His 
gaze locked on Hydras.

mech fluids from

> > Rodimus Prime: On this day, Galvatron, I'll finally KILL 
YOU!!!!!!!!
> > Rodimus transformes to car mode and fires his propulsion 
rockets. Full power all 
> > at once, sending Rodimus Prime at Hydras' gut at an airborn 
300mph!

picture on all of

bot, she didn't

Her father is the

is gone, and a > killing machine is in his place. I actually pitty 
those Predacons now, for what

The hatred, the
